tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_telemetry_data (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    player_location GEOMETRY(POINT),
    game_session_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE game_stats (
  game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  game_duration INT,
  fps_avg FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  game_name VARCHAR(255),
  session_duration INTERVAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE gameplay_stats (
  stat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID,
  enemy_kills INT,
  player_health DECIMAL,
  player_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_interaction (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_duration INTERVAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GameSessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  player_id UUID,
  game_name VARCHAR,
  track_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE PlayerStats (
  player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  total_score INT,
  total_playtime INTERVAL,
  player_level INT,
  achievements JSON
)

CREATE TABLE GameAssets (
  asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR,
  asset_type VARCHAR,
  asset_size INT,
  upload_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GameEvents (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id UUID,
  event_type VARCHAR,
  event_data JSON,
  event_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GameSession (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    duration INT,
    UNIQUE(user_id, start_time)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerStats (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR,
    score INT,
    health INT,
    ammo INT
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerMovement (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    session_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    position_x FLOAT,
    position_y FLOAT,
    position_z FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE GameSettings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    graphics_quality VARCHAR,
    sound_level INT,
    controls_scheme VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT,
    fps INT,
    gpu_usage FLOAT,
    cpu_usage FLOAT
);
